# join and clean

```{r warning=FALSE}
data <- movies |>
  left_join(bechdel, by = "title") |>
  filter(year.x == year.y) |>
  rename("year" = `year.x`) |>
  subset(select = -c(year.y, imdb_id.y, imdb_id.x, error, poster, type, imdb,
                  code, period_code, decade_code, released, response, runtime))
```
